exist:query.exist:text: xquery version "1.0"; declare namespace xmldb="http://exist-db.org/xquery/xmldb"; <documents> <headers> <header>name</header> <header>citizenship</header> <header>birth-date</header> <header>birth-place</header> </headers> { let $collection-name := '/db/orbeon/forms/G-325A/' for $resource-name in xmldb:get-child-resources($collection-name) let $resource-date := xmldb:last-modified($collection-name, $resource-name) let $resource := doc(concat($collection-name, $resource-name)) order by $resource-date descending return <document> <id>{$resource-name}</id> <date>{$resource-date}</date> <details> <detail> {string(for $name in $resource//personal-information/name return concat($name/first, ' ', $name/initial, if ($name/initial != '') then ' ' else (), $name/last))} </detail> <detail> {string($resource//personal-information/citizenship)} </detail> <detail> {string($resource//personal-information/birth/date)} </detail> <detail> {string(for $birth in $resource//personal-information/birth return concat($birth/city, ', ', $birth/country))} </detail> </details> </document> } </documents>
